title: Attempting to recconect message pops up and discconects me from the match every 5 minutes
body: This started yesterday, I was playing and out of nowhere my game lags out and my champion just stops moving even though the other champions could move and clearly see me not moving. The message on the top of the screen pops up saying attempting to reconnect. Then I'm dead. IDK what is happening because I'm at a constant 90 ping but the game just attempts to reconnect every 5 minutes and disconnects me. It is really annoying, should I reinstall the game? Or is it my pc? Or my router? Any way to fix this? Need help, please.

replies.body: It seems that despite your ping, your network is unstable and kicking you off the game server.  Your router is a good step, but I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities.  Test it in a custom game!  Let me know if you have any questions!
